content:
A total of 159 settlements and 94 infrastructure facilities were attacked.

About thisreported March 5Military Media Center.

The enemy struck a wide range of weapons: mortars, artillery, tanks, reactive artillery system, anti-aircraft missile complexes, UAVs and tactical aviation.

The shelling is dead and injured among civilians. The number of victims is specified.

BeforeIt became knownthat shelling of Ukraine was one of the topics of the selector meeting held by the President.
title: The enemy fired at ten Ukrainian areas
description: This was reported on March 5 by Military Media Center. The enemy struck a wide circle ...
author: Army Inform
